entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
